name: factombip44
description: Bip44 implmentation for Factom. Just generates private keys

scripts.example: browserify examples/examples.js -s Util -t  [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > dist/example.js   && node dist/example.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build:docs && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:dist: browserify -r ./index.js:factomjs-util -s Util -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > dist/factombip44.js

author: emyrk
